resources.string:
Friday, Nov. 3 
12:00 pm – 4:00 pm 		Registration at the Atherton 
3:00 pm – 4:00 pm 		Opening Ceremonies 
4:30 pm – 6:30 pm 		Committee Session I 
6:30 pm – 8:00 pm 		Break 
8:00 pm – 9:00 pm 		Advisor Meeting 
8:00 pm – 10:00 pm 		Committee Session II


Saturday, Nov. 4 
9:30 am – 12:00 pm 		Committee Session III 
12:00 pm – 2:00 pm 		Lunch Break 
2:00 pm – 4:30 pm 		Committee Session IV 
4:30 pm – 6:30 pm 		Dinner 
6:30 pm – 9:00 pm 		Committee Session V 
7:00 pm - 8:00 pm 		Advisor Meeting 
10:00 pm – 12:00 am 		Delegate Social


Sunday, Nov. 5 
9:30 am – 11:30 am 		Committee Session VI 
12:30 pm – 1:30 pm 		Closing Ceremonies
Daniel Donaher \nUSG for Crisis and Committee Development
